category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CFM_ITEM_TYPE_RULE_INCLUDE_SUB_TYPE
preference.preference_description: Indicates whether or not sub types and its hierarchy can be used when we have base type in has item type rule. Valid values are true/false. true - Allow the user to configure structure of sub types based on the base type in revision rule entry. false - Allow the user to configure the structure only when the rule item type equals the type of the item.
